title: Gillette Stadium
summary: Gillette Stadium is a stadium in the northeastern United States, located in Foxborough, Massachusetts, 28 miles (45 km) southwest of downtown Boston and 20 miles (32 km) northeast of downtown Providence, Rhode Island. It opened 19 years ago in 2002, replacing the adjacent Foxboro Stadium.[7][8] The seating capacity is 65,878, including 5,876 club seats and 89 luxury suites.
